Source code for pynit.core.messages

import warnings


[docs]class Warning(object):
    @staticmethod

[docs]    def warning_on_one_line(message, category, filename, lineno, file=None, line=None):
        return '%s: %s\n' % (category.__name__, message)


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def deprecated():
        warnings.formatwarning = Warning.warning_on_one_line
        warnings.simplefilter("default")
        warnings.warn("pynit.Preprocess() will be deprecated soon. Please use pynit.Process() instead.", DeprecationWarning,
                      stacklevel=2)
        warnings.simplefilter("ignore")

    """ Correction of CustomExceptions
    """
